body_html:
@dandelionmane @vrv Looks like this op is already a registered op in the tensorflow core op library, as it is listed here. Defining this op as a custom user op instead is therefore failing the following tests, as tensorflow is unable to find it as a registered op anymore:

//tensorflow/core/ops/compat:backwards_compatibility_test
//tensorflow/examples/adding_an_op:fact_test

Also since a test case already exists for this op here: /tensorflow/examples/adding_an_op/fact_test.py, there is no need to add a second test case.

Should we therefore close this PR?
